channel.title: How do I make this more “heavy”? — Osharu
channel.description:
https://app.auxy.co/projects/CUj-5ai0BzSKxtQikLntmw==
The drop seems to be missing something super important, but I cant figure it out! Can someone please help me out?

item.title: How do I make this more “heavy”? — Osharu
item.dc:creator: Xicon
item.description:
Imo, the bass drops starting at scene 7 should have more growls implemented to have that more heroic type of feeling from your project. Also, in my opinion, I would make the bpm a bit faster to like 130 bpm or something close to that. Not only that, but adjust the drum kit instruments you use. They sound like the drum pads form Auxy 4. (I mean, I don’t have my headphones on when listening to that so I may’ve miscalculated.)

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make this more “heavy”? — Osharu
